info.title: OpenASM API
info.description: OpenASM (Open Asset Management) REST API for comprehensive asset management with multi-tenancy support

patch.summary: Calculate and update data quality score

get.summary: Get assets with warranties expiring soon

post.summary: Login user and get JWT token

customer_ids.description: Array of customer IDs to activate
Array of customer IDs to deactivate

get.description: Get a paginated list of all locations with optional filtering
Get details of a specific location
Get all assets at a specific location
Get a paginated list of all OEMs with optional filtering

post.description: Create a new Original Equipment Manufacturer

get.description: Get details of a specific OEM

get.summary: Get current organization overview with detailed information

get.description: Get a paginated list of all products with optional filtering and inclusion of related resources

post.description: Create a new product in the catalog

get.description: Get details of a specific product
Get a paginated list of all tags with optional filtering and inclusion of related assets

post.description: Create a new tag for flexible categorization

get.description: Get details of a specific tag

post.description: Attach a tag to multiple assets

delete.description: Detach a tag from multiple assets

get.description: Get a paginated list of all asset types with optional filtering and inclusion of related assets

post.description: Create a new asset type for categorization

get.description: Get details of a specific asset type

from.description: First item number on current page

to.description: Last item number on current page
